not-email: The email must be in the format: example@example.com
not-unique-email: Account with this e-mail is already registered
incorrect-password-field-length: Password must be between 6 and 64 characters
incorrect-length-username-length: Username must be between 4 and 30 characters
incorrect-username-or-email-field-length: Username must be between 4 and 30 characters or enter an e-mail in the following format: example@example.com
forbidden-symbols-username: The username must contain only letters and numbers
no-username-password: You must specify username(e-mail) and password
incorrect-trip-city-field-length: City name must be between 2 and 300 characters
incorrect-trip-article-length: Trip article should not be longer than 2500 characters
no-article-title-field: Title of the article is required
no-article-body-field: Content of the article is required
incorrect-get-user-articles-userId-field: User id field must contain only one number
incorrect-get-user-articles-offset-field: The offset field must contain only one number
incorrect-get-user-articles-limit-field: The article limit field must contain only one number
incorrect-put-remove-like-articleId-fiel: The article id should be 7 characters long
incorrect-get-article-id-field: The article id should be 7 characters long
